name: Blip
description: Animate the text of character messages with variable speed and play sound along the animation. By my thoughts. should be part of ST exactly

name: Timelines
description: Adds a timeline navigation to the chat history.

name: HypeBot
description: Show personalized suggestions based on your recent chats using the NovelAI's HypeBot engine. Requires an active NovelAI subscription. So, doubt that would be uselful.

name: Chat Variables
description: (For developers). Simple plugin showcasing the capabilities of handlebars and chat metadata in extensions.
